mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart(cart_no, user_id, eb_no) VALUES (cart_seq.nextval, #{user_id}, #{eb_no})
mapper.select: SELECT row_number() over(order by c.cart_no desc) as r, c.cart_no , c.user_id, c.eb_no, c.rdate, e.eb_no , e.eb_title, e.eb_price, e.eb_thumb FROM cart c INNER JOIN ebook e ON c.eb_no = e.eb_no WHERE c.user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE cart WHERE cart_no = #{cart_no} AND user_id =#{user_id}
